sentences.en: The Maya believed natural wells, as the Xkeken cenote in Mexico's Yucat á n, led to the underworld.
sentences.cn: 玛雅人相信, 诸如墨西哥尤卡坦半岛上的斯科肯石灰岩坑之类的天然深井是通向地狱的.

trans.tran_cn: 沼穴，洞状陷穴（尤指墨西哥尤加坦半岛的灰岩坑），竖井
trans.tran_en: (esp in the Yucatán peninsula) a natural well formed by the collapse of an overlying limestone crust: often used as a sacrificial site by the Mayas
